attributes.action: david cameron to publicly feed his children halal meat
attributes.additional_details: i want halal meat banned from our schools, restaurants, takeaways. to be only available by request. we, the british public have a right to know what we are eating. i do not want my children eating meat that has been ritually slaughtered. i want precise labelling on all meat products so the public can make an informed choice. we, the british public should not have to change our eating habits to make life easier for a minority of immigrants who refuse to eat our food as it is.
